summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing for ringtone feature. All endpoints properly handle ringtone field with 100% success rate.
passed_tests: API Connection - Backend accessible and responding correctly
Ringtone URL Accessibility - Test URL https://azjankari.in/audio/song2.mp3 is accessible (audio/mpeg, 226KB)
GET /api/instrumentals/featured - Returns 4 featured tracks, all with ringtone field
GET /api/instrumentals - Returns 17 total tracks, all with ringtone field
POST /api/instrumentals - Successfully creates instrumental with ringtone field
GET /api/instrumentals/{id} - Successfully retrieves instrumental with ringtone field
